execute

private void execute(com.jgraph.layout.JGraphLayout layout)
Executes the current layout on the current graph by creating a facade and progress monitor for the layout and invoking it's run method in a separate thread so this method call returns immediately. To display the result of the layout algorithm a JGraphLayoutMorphingManager is used.

createFacade

private com.jgraph.layout.JGraphFacade createFacade(org.jgraph.JGraph graph)
Creates a JGraphFacade and makes sure it contains a valid set of root cells if the specified layout is a tree layout. A root cell in this context is one that has no incoming edges.

Parameters:
graph - The graph to use for the facade.
Returns:
Returns a new facade for the specified layout and graph.
